discourse_list.title: What about the health of community developers?

content.content: Hi, I am interested to see what ideas exist on how we can help our community have better health! For example, someone that is on a chair for a lot of hours, or is on a screen all the time it is possible to have some health issues that may affect his productivity and in general, have a lower quality of life. Do you think there is possible to create a health service for the gitcoin community that helps these people? Is it possible to create a social security system that helps people with their health problems or provides financial support to them?
health is everyone’s responsibility. I think exercise and less food will help with this problem. movement is a life. everyone knows this, not only in the gitcoin community.
I do agree is possible with improvised events, balanced diet and unrelated gitcoin affairs worthy of discovery gitcoin ideas from.
